content: Hi.... I'm looking for some detailed info on FHIRBlock, not much on GitHub. Where should i be looking please?

@Doug Bulleit, apologies in advance as I know this is going slightly off track, but I read one of the posts about a Draft White Paper on "FHIRBlocks". When this is available please could you kindly share it? I looked at the GitHUb site and couldn't find much information on "FHIRBlocks".

Yes, by all means! In fact, we intend to make most of the FHIRBlocks codebase open source soon, and we have already populated the GitHub repositories as well as drafted a White Paper. We're just holding off making them all public until several key contributors green-light the project
